original_title: 「鬼滅の刃」オーケストラコンサート~鬼滅の奏~
overview: The orchestra concert of the TV Anime Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba is a live performance on the various music used in the anime. Clips from the anime will be shown on a screen, allowing one to enjoy the world of the work.
title: Kimetsu Orchestra Concert
